solution_line_template: The total number of books is {books_whales} books + {books_fish} books = <<{books_whales}+{books_fish}={total_books}>>{total_books} books.
The cost of the books is ${cost_per_book}/book × {total_books} books = $<<{cost_per_book}*{total_books}={cost_books}>>{cost_books}.
The cost of the magazines is ${cost_per_magazine}/magazine × {num_magazines} magazines = $<<{cost_per_magazine}*{num_magazines}={cost_magazines}>>{cost_magazines}.
